sentences.sContent: Tuberous sclerosis can lead to the formation of fibroids or tumors in the pancreas, bone, and liver.
sentences.sContent_eng: Tuberous sclerosis can lead to the formation of fibroids or tumors in the pancreas, bone, and liver.
sentences.sCn: 结节性硬化症可以导致患者的胰腺、骨骼和肝脏发生纤维瘤或其他肿瘤。

sentences.sContent: Objective To improve the diagnosis and treatment of primitive neuroectodermal tumors (PNET) of the pancreas.
sentences.sContent_eng: Objective To improve the diagnosis and treatment of primitive neuroectodermal tumors (PNET) of the pancreas.
sentences.sCn: 目的提高对胰腺原始神经外胚叶肿瘤（PNET）诊断和治疗的认识。

sentences.sContent: I am tired of all this nonsense of beauty being only skin deep. that's deep enough. What do you want—an adorable pancreas?
sentences.sContent_eng: I am tired of all this nonsense of beauty being only skin deep. that's deep enough. What do you want—an adorable pancreas?
sentences.sCn: 我厌倦了一切所谓“美只是肤浅的”的胡说八道。它已经够深刻的了。你究竟想要什么—一个值得崇拜的胰腺？

remMethod.val: pan(全部) + creas(肉) → 给身体生长提供营养的器官 → 胰腺

trans.tranOther: a  gland  inside your body, near your stomach, that produces  insulin  and a liquid that helps your body to use the food that you eat
